title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8146.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8146.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 54. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 54 between the Route 17 interchange
and the Yates county line in the Village of Bath and Towns of Bath, Urbana and

Wayne. (b) Route 15 between IR 390
and the intersection of East Avenue, in the Town of Wayland and the Village of

Wayland. (c) [Eff. until June 22, 1994, see also subd. (c) below.]
Route 36. Route 36 between Route 21 (Main Street) in the City of Hornell and

Route 961F (West Avenue) in the Village of Arkport in the Town of

Hornellsville, the Village of Arkport and the City of Hornell. (c) [Eff. June 22, 1994 until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (c) above and below.]
Route 36. Route 36 between Route 21 (Main Street) in the City of Hornell and
the Steuben-Livingston county line in the Towns of Hornellsville and Dansville, the Village of Arkport and the City of Hornell. (c) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998 until Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (c) above and below.]
Route 36. Route 36 between Route 248 (Greenwood Street) in the Village of

Canisteo and the Steuben-Livingston county line in the Towns of Hornellsville, Dansville and Canisteo, the Villages of Arkport and Canisteo and the City of

Hornell. (c) [Eff. Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (c) above.] Route
36. Route 36 between Route 417 in the Hamlet of Jasper and the

Steuben-Livingston county line in the Towns of Hornellsville, Dansville, Canisteo and Jasper, the Villages of Arkport and Canisteo and the City of

Hornell. (d) Thacher Street between

Adsit Streer and the Roadway Express, Inc. terminal in the Hornell Industrial

Park; in the City of Hornell and the Town of Hornellsville. (e) Route 961P. Route 961P between East

Pulteney Street and Route 17 in the City of Corning and Town of

Corning. (f) [Eff. until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (f) below.]
Route 21. Route 21 between IR 390 and the intersection of Route 36 in the Towns
of Wayland, Fremont and Hornellsville. (f) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also
subd. (f) above.] Route 21. Route 21
between the Steuben-Ontario county line and the intersection of Route 36, in
the Towns of Cohocton, Wayland, Fremont and Hornellsville and the Village of

Wayland. (g) [Eff. until Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (g) below.]
Route 21. Route 21 between Route 36 and Plaza 21 driveway, a distance of 1.0
mile in the City of Hornell and Town of Hornellsville. (g) [Eff. Sept. 1, 1999 until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (g) above and below.]
Route 417. Route 417 between its intersection with Route 36 in the Hanlet and

Town of Jasper and exit 3 of Route 15 in the Towns of Jasper, Woodhull, Tuscarora, Addison and Erwin and the Villages of Woodhull and

Addison. (g) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (g) above.] Route
417. Route 417 between the Steuben-Allegany county line and Route 15 (exit 3)
in the Towns of Greenwood, Jasper, Woodhull, Tuscarora, Addison and Erwin and
the Village of Addison. (h) Route
53. Route 53 between IR 86 (exit 37) and the Steuben-Ontario county line, a
distance of 20+- miles in the Towns of Bath, Wheeler and Prattsburgh. (i) Route 962D. Route 962D between Route 415
and the southbound on/off ramps of IR 390 in the Town of Cohocton and the

Village of Cohocton. (j) Route 371. Route 371 between Route 21 and Route 415 in the Town of Cohocton and the

Village of Cohocton. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8146.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
